title: Skeleton

properties.name: description
properties.value: Skeletons are undead monsters found in various locations across RuneScape, often in graveyards and dungeons. Being an undead monster, it is weak to Crumble Undead and the Salve amulet. They are also often weak against crush attacks.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:SkeletonThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Skeleton
This article is about the common variant. For other skeletons, see Skeleton (disambiguation).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Skeletons are undead monsters found in various locations across RuneScape, often in graveyards and dungeons. Being an undead monster, it is weak to Crumble Undead and the Salve amulet. They are also often weak against crush attacks.

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The level 45 skeletons in the Crandor and Karamja Dungeon, just outside of Elvarg's lair, seem taller than the other skeletons and appear to be the same size as giant skeletons.
  • Upon opening a wardrobe, there is a 1/21 chance of a non-interactable skeleton appearing inside.[1] This is a reference to a common idiom. If there is a skeleton inside the wardrobe, searching the wardrobe yields the text "Eek! There's a skeleton in there."
  • There are level 35 skeletons in the Wrath Altar - they cannot be attacked, and examining them gives the text "Even in death he still fights." While they have swords, they use the same attack animation as zombies.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 13 May 2018. (Archived from the original on 28 May 2020.)

Being an undead monster, it is weak to [[Crumble Undead]] and the [[Salve amulet]]. present |} ==Trivia== *The level 45 skeletons in the [[Crandor and Karamja Dungeon]], just outside of [[Elvarg]]'s lair, seem taller than the other skeletons and appear to be the same size as [[giant skeleton]]s. *Upon opening a wardrobe, there is a 1/21 chance of a non-interactable skeleton appearing inside.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/995762966518788096|date=13 May 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/FPJBA|archivedate=28 May 2020}} This is a reference to {{wp|Skeleton in the closet (idiom)|a common idiom}}. If there is a skeleton inside the wardrobe, searching the wardrobe yields the text "''Eek! There's a skeleton in there.''" *There are level 35 skeletons in the [[Wrath Altar]] - they cannot be attacked, and examining them gives the text "Even in death he still fights." While they have swords, they use the same attack animation as [[zombie]]s. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Crandor and Karamja Dungeon}} {{Edgeville Dungeon}} {{Gu'Tanoth}} {{Kingstown}} {{Taverley Dungeon}} {{Waterfall Dungeon}} [[Category:Undead]]
